author: Jay "Lorehunter" Kirkman
description: Seven days, Space Wolves fans. Last week saw the release of a delightful array of the new miniatures, including the new Army Set. At the time I noted it was a bit of a missed opportunity for them not to also be releasing the teased Space Wolves: The Young Wolf boxed set for the Black […]
title: Black Library Weekly: But Seven Days of Rest, Ye Sons of Russ

author: Thundercloud1
description: Last week we were treated to a preview of the newest edition of Horus Heresy, with reveals of new models, boxed sets and rules. As you can imagine, the community had some strong opinions about the new kits – and so did our authors. In this roundtable, we sat down to talk about the reveals […]
title: Horus Heresy Reveal Stream Roundtable

author: Vincent Curkov
description: Squad Goals, the 3-man marvel crisis protocol team tournament wrapped earlier this month. I was there as a color commentator and judge. During the event I had 2 very interesting rules questions that I want to talk about here, so strap in because we are diving deep into the rules for this one. First I […]
title: Crisis Protocol: How I Made 2 Wrong Judge Calls at Squad Goals

author: Bair, NotThatHenryC, Momma-Negan, Variance Hammer Eric and zac1471
description: In what has now become a mini-series, we continue along talking about our very favourite kits to have painted. These are not necessarily our best painted models but instead are the ones that we had the most fun with! When it comes to historical miniatures, gamers are blessed with a massive number of sources for […]
title: The Most Fun Historicals Kits to Paint: Goonhammer Staff Picks

author: Matthew 'chimp' Ward
description: This month is bringing a massive host of updates to Age of Sigmar as the setting transitions to Ghyran, the realm of life. Each army is getting two whole pages of additional rules and optional alternative warscrolls for you to use in your games and we are very excited about all of it! Before we […]
title: Age of Sigmar Scourge of Ghyran: Ogor Mawtribes Review
